forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 2pm, then a chance of rain between 2pm and 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. West wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 46. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 28. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: 6-inches of snow on Thursday and a complete powertilling of the upper loops to World Cup specs this morning. A touch soft today, but should be an amazing 7-10 day stretch starting tomorrow. Huge shoutout to Ben and the entire crew at Nubs for their commitment to Nordic skiing.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments: Five inches of snow fell on the slopes last night and it continues to snow this morning. The beginner runs were groomed last so they only have a small amount of new snow on top of the corduroy. The steeper runs were groomed first and this is where you will find more snow depth. All of the XC trails are being power-tilled and tracked this morning and the snowshoe trail is in good shape. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
